capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Leading the development and implementation of education programs requires advanced skills in engaging, motivating, and developing staff capabilities.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role involves achieving project deadlines and milestones within budget, necessitating an advanced ability to efficiently use resources and commit to quality outcomes.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Requires advanced planning skills to achieve priority outcomes in the development and promotion of education programs.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Needs to develop practical solutions for education and visitor experience enhancement, requiring advanced problem-solving skills.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Essential for promoting education programs and collaborating with internal and external suppliers, necessitating advanced communication skills.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: The role involves partnership with internal and external suppliers, requiring an advanced level of collaborative work.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respecting diverse backgrounds is crucial in developing education programs for a geographically and culturally diverse client base.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Requires advanced project management skills for overseeing the development, promotion, and evaluation of education programs.

skills.name: Education Program Development
skills.description: Developing and implementing comprehensive education programs for diverse audiences.

skills.name: Leadership and Supervision
skills.description: Guiding and supervising staff to achieve project deadlines and quality standards.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Collaborating with internal and external suppliers to enhance education and visitor experiences.

skills.name: Knowledge of Environmental Conservation
skills.description: Understanding of natural environment, Aboriginal culture, and conservation issues to inform education programs.

generalRole.title: Environmental Education Program Leader
generalRole.description: This role involves leading the development, promotion, and evaluation of education programs focused on environmental conservation, visitor experience, and cultural heritage awareness within national parks. It requires a blend of project management, educational program development, and stakeholder engagement skills.
